name: Spear of the Heretic
description:
Spear of the Heretic is an isometric rogue-lite set in a stylised gloomy fey wilderness. Hone your skills and gain power in an attempt to escape insectoid hordes after abandoning a cult.

Upgrade your spear and abilities as you fend off swarms of powerful foes. As the cult increases their attack, will you have what it takes to survive?

This is a 5 person uni project made in 4 and a half months and is still ongoing minor updates. We all had a lot of fun creating this project and working together was very pleasant. Although there are some things that can certainly be improved, we're all very happy with how this has turned out.
